text: Call Her Savage is a 1932 American drama movie directed by John Francis Dillon and based on the novel of the same name by Tiffany Thayer. It stars Clara Bow, Gilbert Roland, Thelma Todd, Monroe Owsley, Estelle Taylor, Weldon Heyburn and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1932 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:LGBT movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Call Her Savage
